Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory802.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The moon rises above the horizon, and stars fill the sky. A cool night breeze rustles through the trees lining the streets of Constellia.'}

{1: '1', 3: 'A long-haired girl stands quietly beneath the bamboo shadows, holding a pale blue letter. She turns to look at you under the moonlight, her hair flowing like silk in the wind, carrying a faint scent of iris.'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'Here you are, 【kuroname】.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She gives you a gentle smile and sets the letter down next to the calligraphy brush.'}
{2: "Sorry I'm late.", 3: '10', 4: 'Sorry, there was a last-minute mission at Babylonia...', 5: '10'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: "No need to apologize. You're here... That's all that matters.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: "Conductor, we still have three hours to make wishes for the Double Seventh Festival. Do you have any wish you'd like to tell the Weaver Girl?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Only now do you notice the wooden table in front of Selena, piled with colorful wish notes written in elegant handwriting.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Selena', 3: "Oh, these? They're just some lines I wrote while practicing.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'Or... would you like to read some, Conductor?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'Then... please forgive my humble attempt.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With flushed cheeks, she picks up one of the notes and takes a small breath.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1207.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Autumn winds rise as night grows deep,', 4: '150', 6: '1', 9: '2', 11: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'Autumn winds rise as night grows deep,'}
{1: '2', 2: 'I bow to scoop the starry stream,', 4: '50', 6: '1', 9: '2', 11: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'I bow to scoop the starry stream,'}
{1: '3', 2: 'Beneath the Magpie Bridge, waves ripple free,', 4: '-50', 6: '1', 9: '2', 11: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'Beneath the Magpie Bridge, waves ripple free,'}
{1: '4', 2: 'Here I stand, awaiting thee.', 4: '-150', 6: '1', 9: '2', 11: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'Here I stand, awaiting thee.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory802.jpg'}
{1: 'AniZhuanchangEnd'}
{1: '1', 3: 'She nervously puts the paper down and looks your way expectantly.'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'What do you think, Conductor?', 4: '1'}
{2: "It's beautiful.", 3: '43', 4: "It's beautifully written.", 5: '43'}
{2: 'Are you going to hang it on the bamboo leaves?', 3: '44'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: "No, this one's just practice.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'What I really want to hang up there... is a wish written together with you, Conductor.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She lowers her head slightly, silky hair hiding half of her flushed face.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Selena', 3: 'Legend says that on the Double Seventh Festival, if you hang your wish on bamboo, magpies will carry it to the Weaver Girl.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'The Weaver Girl picks the wish hung highest on the tree and grants it that same night.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: "But I don't need the Weaver Girl to actually grant any wish. I just want to create this memory with you, Conductor.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory550.jpg'}
{3: 'Selena takes your hand, and together you gaze up through the gaps between bamboo leaves at the endless starry sky above.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Selena', 3: 'Having you here, celebrating with me...', 4: '18'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: "That's already enough.", 4: '18'}
{2: 'Is that really enough?', 3: '64', 4: 'We still have plenty of time. We could do so much more.', 5: '64'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory802.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory802.jpg'}
{3: 'Her temperature rises slightly, and her heartbeat quickens, betraying the emotions stirring within her M.I.N.D.'}
{3: 'But Selena simply tightens her grip on your hand.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Selena', 3: "You've already made time for me, Conductor. I don't want to tire you out.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Actually, I don't have any plans tonight.", 3: '80', 4: 'Think of it as you keeping me company. Shall we do something together?', 5: '80'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: "Well... I do have one wish I'd like your help with.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Gathering courage, she picks up a long silk ribbon from the table.'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Selena', 3: "There's a legend: on the Double Seventh Festival, two people write a hundred wishes on a silk ribbon and hang it high in a tree. After that, the Weaver Girl grants them one wish every year.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'Could I invite you, Conductor, to write those hundred wishes together with me?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With a gentle smile, she hands you the smooth ribbon.'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: "If you don't have anything specific, we could just dream about the future.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'About having each other... far into the future.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She speaks earnestly, her words filled with deep longing.'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: "We can imagine the life we'll share, the dreams we'll fulfill.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: "Far into the future, after the war, maybe even after we've moved back to Earth... We'll still be together, making plans, just like today.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'Just imagining being with you makes me happy.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Perhaps I'm thinking too far ahead, but even a hundred wishes aren't enough.", 3: '98'}
{3: "She silently embraces you, no more words needed. You understand everything she's feeling."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1076.jpg'}
{3: 'The summer breeze blows gently, carrying the distant sounds of fireworks.'}
{3: 'Fireworks burst like a kaleidoscope in the night sky over Constellia.'}
{3: "For a brief, brilliant second, the light lights up Selena's profile, and at that moment, it feels as if time stood still."}
{2: '(Tighten your arm around her shoulders)', 3: '114'}
{3: 'You feel her gently responding with an embrace around your waist.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Selena', 3: "It's so beautiful...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: "I'll remember this moment forever.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: "In the future... let's create many more memories like this together.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Her smile shines brightly under the fireworks.'}
{2: 'Selena', 3: 'My first and only... Conductor.', 4: '1'}
